about_the_game:
Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery is an immersive post-apocalyptic trucking simulation game where players navigate the dangerous and desolate landscapes of the Deadlands. Inspired by the high-octane action and gritty aesthetic of this genre, this game challenges players to build and manage their own delivery company in a world where civilization has crumbled, and survival hinges on resourcefulness, skill, and brute force.

Company Building:

  • Objective: Players start with a basic truck and a small delivery business, with the ultimate goal of expanding into a dominant logistics empire across the Deadlands.
  • Tasks: Manage resources and plan efficient delivery routes. Successful deliveries will lead to higher profits, allowing further expansion and improvements.



Truck Customization and Upgrades:

  • Customization: Players can personalize their trucks with various parts and aesthetics, creating a unique and formidable fleet.
  • Upgrades: Enhance trucks with better engines, reinforced armor, larger cargo holds, and specialized equipment to handle the harsh environment.
  • Weapons and Defense: Equip trucks with a range of turrets, spikes, and other defensive measures to fend off bandits and other threats on the road.



Combat and Protection:

  • Bandit Encounters: Regularly fight off attacks from roving bandits seeking to hijack valuable cargo.
  • Turret Installation: Strategically install and upgrade turrets and other weaponry to protect your shipments during transit.
  • Tactical Combat: Engage in real-time combat, making quick decisions to outmaneuver and defeat attackers.



Terrain and Environmental Challenges:

  • Dynamic Weather: Face various weather conditions that affect driving, visibility, and road conditions.
  • Difficult Terrains: Navigate through mud pits, quicksand, rocky trails, and narrow off-road paths that challenge driving skills and truck durability.
  • Obstacles: Deal with roadblocks, collapsed structures, and natural disasters that can obstruct routes and necessitate detours.



Missions and Contracts:

  • Diverse Contracts: Accept and complete a wide range of delivery missions, from transporting essential supplies to escorting valuable assets across the wasteland.
  • Reputation System: Build a reputation based on successful deliveries and combat prowess, attracting higher-paying and more prestigious contracts.

Key Features:

  • Realistic Truck Physics: Experience realistic driving mechanics that take into account the weight, balance, and handling of heavily modified trucks.
  • Sandbox Environment: Explore a vast open-world map filled with hidden locations, resources, and opportunities for scavenging and trading.
  • Survival Elements: Manage fuel, truck condition and other survival resources to keep your operation running smoothly in the hostile environment.
  • Visual and Audio Design: Immerse yourself in the gritty, dystopian atmosphere with detailed graphics, dynamic lighting, and a soundtrack that captures the tension and excitement of life on the edge.



Dust and Diesel: Deadland Delivery combines the thrill of high-stakes trucking with strategic management and intense combat, offering a unique and engaging experience in a richly crafted post-apocalyptic world. Will you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate Deadland delivery magnate, or will the wasteland consume you and your dreams? The journey begins behind the wheel.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: i5 8259U 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 775M, 2 GB , AMD Radeon 555, 2 GB, Intel Iris Plus 655
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13
  • Processor: i5 3.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 570

movies.name: Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery - Official Trailer

name: Dust & Diesel: Deadland Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 (6GB) / Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F / AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3070 / Radeon RX 6800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Survive in a desolate post-apocalyptic world as a trucker, building your delivery empire. Customize and upgrade your trucks, fight off bandits, and navigate dangerous terrains. Complete challenging missions and uncover the wasteland secrets. Are you ready to conquer the Deadlands?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
